alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 16 at 4:44PM MDT until September 16 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MDT/630 PM CDT/ FOR WESTERN TODD AND EAST CENTRAL BENNETT COUNTIES... At 443 PM MDT/543 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Spring Creek, or 27 miles southwest of Mission, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rosebud, Saint Francis, Spring Creek, Upper Cut Meat, Soldier Creek, Lakeview, Fairgrounds Housing, Harrington, Two Strike, Grass Mountain, Ring Thunder and western Rosebud Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
